Package src.Entity

package src.Entity
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    src
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Administrator
    The Administrator class represents a specific type of staff member, inheriting from the Staff class.
    Appointment
    The Appointment class represents an appointment between a doctor and a patient.
    AppointmentOutcomeRecord
    The AppointmentOutcomeRecord class stores the details of an appointment's outcome, including the type of service provided, consultation notes, and any prescribed medications.
    Availability
    The Availability class represents a specific time slot for a particular day of the week, including the start and end time.
    Doctor
    The Doctor class represents a doctor with a list of appointments and a weekly schedule of availability.
    MedicalHistory
    The MedicalHistory class represents the medical history of a patient, including their diagnosis, treatment plan, and prescribed medications.
    MedicalRecord
    The MedicalRecord class represents the medical record of a patient, including personal details and a list of medical history entries.
    Medication
    The Medication class represents a medication with attributes such as name, stock level, and a low-stock threshold.
    Nurse
    The Nurse class represents a nurse in the system, extending the Staff class.
    Patient
    The Patient class represents a patient in the system, inheriting from the User class.
    Pharmacist
    The Pharmacist class represents a pharmacist in the system, inheriting from the Staff class.
    PrescribedMedication
    The PrescribedMedication class represents a medication that has been prescribed to a patient.
    Request
    The Request class represents a request for a medication made by a pharmacist or any authorized staff member.
    Staff
    The Staff class is an abstract class that represents a staff member in the hospital system.
    User
    The User class represents a generic user in the hospital system.
